property.name: Name
property.description:
Type: "C",
Mode: "R",
Default = "". The unique name of the column to be indexed within the table.

property.name: Ascending
property.description:
Type: "L",
Mode: "R",
Default = FALSE (.F.)
True (.T.) = column is in ascending order.
False (.F.) = the column is in descending order.

property.name: NullAllowed
property.description:
L
R
Default = FALSE (.F.)
True (.T.) = the column can be included in the index even if it is NULL.
False (.F.) = the column may not be included in the index if it is NULL.

methodref.name: Clone
methodref.description: Makes a copy of the SQL::IndexColumnInfo object and its contents.

section.description: A SQL index contains one or more columns. as a result, a SQL::IndexInfo object contains one or more SQL::IndexColumnInfo objects, each of which describes one of the column(s) that make up the primary key, the foreign key, of a unique or non-unique index.
